document.full_text: german chancellor angela merkel said monday she was pleased that al qaeda leader osama bin laden had been killed by u.s. forces, calling it "good news."
document.title: merkel says she's glad bin laden killed by u.s
lines_and_colors: german chancellor angela merkel said monday she was pleased that al qaeda leader osama bin laden had been killed by u.s. forces, calling it "good news."
